column2: FROM [schema].ar_account INNER JOIN [schema].ar_account_group ON ar_account_group.account_group_id = ar_account.account_group_id WHERE ar_account.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId  > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID OR ar_account_group.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId  > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID
